entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
